289
May 10th 4
T W Kennedy Esq
Custom House
Paducah. Ky:
Sir.

Your communication of the 6th inst to his Excellency Govr. Bramlette, has been referred to me for reply. We have no authority to recruit 100 day men, but have been granted the permission by the Secy of War to raise 10.000 six months men. General Orders No 3 from these Hd qrs in relation thereto, I inclose you. We will accept any number of men you may raise for that term of service, and they will be armed as soon as organized. I telegraphed you, the purport of this letter, to day --

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
